name: Alone in the War
description:
In this isometric shooter, you are the only agent left to destroy an entire army of soldiers.

Get your weapons and get ready to shoot anyone in your way.

Features:

- Kill all enemies in each level to proceed to the next one
- Collect coins through levels to upgrade your weapons
- Use collected coins to increase the power of your weapons
- Three different weapons to use, unlock them after complete some levels
